
---
name: code-quality
description: Improve Python code quality with ruff linting and formatting. Use when lint errors, style issues, or quality improvements are needed.
---

# Workflow
1. Run ruff lint and format.
2. Fix the smallest issues first; avoid broad rewrites.
3. Prefer local fixes over global ignores.

# Scripts
- Use `scripts/run_ruff.sh` for lint and format.
